sentences.en: Agnostic: A person who believes that nothing can be known about God or life after death.
sentences.cn: 不可知论: 指相信上帝、神、回等现象是不可被认知的.
不可知论者即是怀疑论者.

sentences.en: Catholics are agnostic to the Protestant creeds.
sentences.cn: 天主教徒对于新教教义来说,是不可知论者.

sentences.en: However, in the case of SCM tools , this tool agnostic approach is somewhat to achieve.
sentences.cn: 当然, 对于配置管理工具而言, 不确定工具的方向是有点难以达到的.

sentences.en: I am agnostic; I do not to know what many ignorant men are sure of.
sentences.cn: 者; 我不假装知道许多无知的人以为知道的一清二楚的东西.

sentences.en: I an agnostic; I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men is sure of.
sentences.cn: 我是个不可知论者; 我不假装知道许多无知的人以为知道的一清二楚的东西.

sentences.en: I have mentioned that Locke was very agnostic.
sentences.cn: 我提到过，洛克是个不可知论者。

sentences.en: Implementation to be exception agnostic so that it can be used in environments without exceptions.
sentences.cn: 实现改为异常不可知的,以便可在无异常的环境中使用.

sentences.en: It is also GUI toolkit agnostic and portable.
It was all new to me because, like my father, I was an agnostic and had not heard of fundamentalism.
sentences.cn: 这对我来说是新鲜的，因为我以前跟父亲一样，都是不可知论者，我并无接触过基要派。

sentences.en: She was an atheist, and I was an agnostic.
sentences.cn: 她是个无神论者，而我则是个不可知论者。

sentences.en: To find out the special agnostic criterions of cough variability asthma ( CVA ) through differential diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 目的通过对咳嗽变异型哮喘的鉴别诊断,找到诊断咳嗽变异型哮喘的特定诊断指标,对症治疗.

sentences.en: Vasari claimed with horror that he was, if not an atheist, then an agnostic.
sentences.cn: 瓦萨里惊恐地说他若非无神论者，就是不可知论者。

sentences.en: We were essentially agnostic about how and when political cohesion came about.
sentences.cn: 其实,我们并不想知道政治结合怎样实现,何时实现.

sentences.en: When an atheist or agnostic asks me about Sunday School for their children, I recommend exposing their children to a religion.
sentences.cn: 当一个无神论者或不可知论者问我星期天学校的事时，我的建议是让孩子去了解宗教。

trans.tran_en: someone who believes that people cannot know whether God exists or not
